channel.title: Help me please
channel.description: doesn't it work to ban a ip from spam vote down my server anyone please help!?!

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @alex321 alex321
item.description:
@alex321 wrote:

[quote=“Mental Piracy, post:5, topic:412623”][quote author=alex321 link=topic=514101.msg3731087#msg3731087 date=1314634337]

How about you start making sense before asking for help

he’s pissing me off, i had 210 votes, he just doing that to make me get no players! :@
[/quote]
Still barely making any sense… you want to ipban someone from using a 3rd party voting site to post negative reviews about your server? Obviously the toplist you are using is shit if they allow degrading votes since its easily abused.[/quote]

nvm i translated it, do you know other server list i can post my server on?

Read full topic
